property.name: DefaultIssueCategories
property.value: Other, Profile Question, Requirements Question, Suggestion, Testing Question

property.name: DefaultPartnerCategories
property.value: Customer, Distributor, Manufacturer, Reseller, Supplier, VAR

property.name: DefaultContactCategories
property.value: Business Analyst, Compliance Officer, EDI Coordinator, Information Technology, Program Manager, Project Manager, Quality Assurance

property.name: Description
property.value: Provides storage and access services for file-based data. Files are stored in a self-managed directory structure designed to handle a very large number of files. It also supports encryption and compression capabilities.

property.name: Description
property.value: Archives old files in the file repository based on user defined rules.

property.name: Description
property.value: Purges logically deleted files from the file repository based on user defined rules.

property.name: Description
property.value: Validates EDI test data files against user-specified ECS guidelines associated with validation tasks.

property.name: Description
property.value: Validates data file according to XSD schema

property.name: Description
property.value: Sends queued notifications created in the Notification Wizard.

property.name: Description
property.value: Delivers files uploaded via Web to a user specified folder, typically to XEngine Server file connector.

property.name: Description
property.value: Collects performance and usage statistics about the ETL process.

property.name: Description
property.value: Updates the status of each partner program enrollment, based on the partner settings.

property.name: Description
property.value: Updates the status of each partner community enrollment, based on the partner settings.

property.name: Description
property.value: A service task used to periodically delete expired attachments.

property.name: Description
property.value: Checks the conditions associated with business rules and if conditions are met, an event occurs, such as notification being sent.

property.name: Description
property.value: Sends an email for each EMAIL package created by 'XE Adapter' services.

property.name: Description
property.value: Extracts and Transforms EDI data that was intercepted by HTR/TM application and then loads the transformation results into database.

property.name: Description
property.value: Extracts and Transforms EDI data that was intercepted by HTR/TM application and then loads the transformation results into database.

property.name: Description
property.value: Monitors the Application Server by trying to log on to the web application.

property.name: Description
property.value: Monitors the events related to changes in TPM and notifies all the registered applications.

property.name: Description
property.value: This service monitors a folder for files and attaches them to a Partner.

property.name: Description
property.value: A service for executing tasks to purge HTR records like Transmissions marked for deletion, Events, Reporting cleanup

property.name: Description
property.value: Datamart service to load business document datamart.

property.name: Description
property.value: Datamart service to load Validation error datamart.

property.name: Description
property.value: Provides a new ID or an ID interval for specified item type.

property.name: Description
property.value: The GuidelineLoader service loads guidelines to File Repository. It requires guideline files to be present on same machine.

property.name: Description
property.value: Performs Business Items identification, usually by Correlation Id (CID)

property.name: Description
property.value: Loads TrackingInfo Business Items to HTR

property.name: Description
property.value: Deletes the content and resets the transmission before performing the regular ETL processing.
